remarks: If the uniform set of a metric space is the uniform structure generated by its metric, then it is a uniform space.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Dec-2017.)
statement:
xmsusp.x $e |- X = ( Base ` F ) $.
xmsusp.d $e |- D = ( ( dist ` F ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
xmsusp.u $e |- U = ( UnifSt ` F ) $.
xmsusp $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> F e. UnifSp ) $.
